<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-99.1
<SEQUENCE>2
<FILENAME>exh99_1.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 99.1
<TEXT>
<html>
<head>
<title></title>
<!--Licensed to: Marketwired
    Document created using EDGARfilings PROfile 4.1.0.0
    Copyright 1995 - 2016 Summit Financial Printing, LLC.  All rights 
reserved.-->
</head>
<body style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" 
bgcolor="#ffffff" text="#000000">
<div>&#160;</div>
<div>
<hr style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 1px solid; TEXT-ALIGN: center; BACKGROUND-COLOR:
#ffffff; HEIGHT: 10px; COLOR: #ffffff; MARGIN-LEFT: auto; BORDER-TOP: black 4px 
solid; MARGIN-RIGHT: auto" align="center">
</div>
<div style="text-align: right; font-weight: bold;"><a name="Exhibit99.1"><!--
Anchor--></a>Exhibit 99.1</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right">&#160;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
<div>
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: collapse; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id="80493c1d627d4a6ea63ff8597e3ea931" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: #000000 2px solid; 
BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 100%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; BORDER-TOP: #000000
2px solid; BORDER-RIGHT: #000000 2px solid">
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-TOP: 4pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 4pt; COLOR: #ffffff; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">-MANAGEMENT'S RESPONSIBILITY FOR FINANCIAL INFORMATION</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-TOP: 12pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">To the Shareholders of Caledonia Mining Corporation Plc</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-TOP: 12pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12pt; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Management has prepared the information and representations in this 
interim report. The unaudited condensed consolidated interim financial 
statements of Caledonia Mining Corporation Plc ("Group") have been prepared in 
accordance with International Accounting Standard 34 ("IAS 34") Interim 
Financial Reporting and, where appropriate, these statements include some 
amounts that are based on best estimates and judgment. Management have 
determined such amounts on a reasonable basis in order to ensure that the 
unaudited condensed consolidated interim financial statements are presented 
fairly, in all material respects.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-TOP: 12pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12pt; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">The Management Discussion and Analysis ("MD&amp;A") also includes 
information regarding the impact of current transactions, sources of liquidity, 
capital resources, operating trends, risks and uncertainties. Actual results in 
the future may differ materially from our present assessment of this information
because future events and circumstances may not occur as expected.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-TOP: 12pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12pt; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">The Group maintains adequate systems of internal accounting and 
administrative controls, consistent with reasonable cost. Such systems are 
designed to provide reasonable assurance that relevant and reliable financial 
information is produced.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-TOP: 12pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12pt; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Management is responsible for establishing and maintaining adequate 
internal controls over financial reporting ("ICOFR"). Any system of internal 
controls over financial reporting, no matter how well designed, has inherent 
limitations. Therefore, even those systems determined to be effective can 
provide only reasonable assurance with respect to financial statement 
preparation and presentation.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-TOP: 12pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12pt; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">At June 30, 2016, management evaluated the effectiveness of the Group's 
internal control over financial reporting and concluded that such internal 
control over financial reporting was effective and there were no material 
weaknesses or changes in internal controls identified by management.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-TOP: 12pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12pt; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">As part of their monitoring and oversight role, the Audit Committee
performs a review and conducts discussions with management. No material 
exceptions were noted based on the additional procedures and no evidence of 
fraudulent activity was found.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-TOP: 12pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12pt; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">The Board of Directors, through its Audit Committee, is responsible for 
ensuring that management fulfils its responsibilities for financial reporting 
and internal control. The Audit Committee is composed of three independent 
directors. This Committee meets periodically with management and the external 
auditor to review accounting, auditing, internal control and financial reporting
matters.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-TOP: 12pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12pt; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">These condensed consolidated interim financial statements have not been 
reviewed by the Group's auditor.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The unaudited 
condensed consolidated interim financial statements for the period ended June 
30, 2016 were approved by the Board of Directors and signed on its behalf on 
August 11,&#160; 2016.</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.3pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="33c19aa31a554b44ae7745a10e6ce18a" border="0" cellspacing="0" 
cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 50%">
<div>(Signed) S. R. Curtis</div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 50%">
<div>(Signed) M. Learmonth</div>
</td>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.65pt"><font

FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Reporting entity<br>
</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.65pt; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Caledonia Mining Corporation Plc (the "Company") is a company domiciled in
Jersey, Channel Islands. The address of the Company's registered office is 43-45
La Motte Street, JE4 8SD, Jersey, Channel Islands. These condensed consolidated 
interim financial statements of the Group as at and for the 6 months ended June 
30, 2016 comprise the Company and its subsidiaries (together referred to as the 
"Group" and individually as "Group entities"). The Group is primarily involved 
in the operation of a gold mine and the exploration and development of mineral 
properties for precious metals.</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.65pt"><font
style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">2</font><font style="WIDTH: 31.35pt; DISPLAY: inline-
block; FONT-SIZE: 1px" id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;</font><font style="FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Basis for preparation</font></div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.65pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(a) Statement of compliance</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.1pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">These 
unaudited condensed consolidated interim financial statements have been prepared
in accordance with IAS 34 </font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Interim 
Financial Reporting</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, 
serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"> and do not include all the information 
required for full annual financial statements.</font> Accordingly, certain 
information and disclosures normally included in the annual financial statements
prepared in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) 
as issued by the International Accounting Standards Board (IASB) have been 
omitted or condensed. Selected explanatory notes are included to explain events 
and transactions that are significant to an understanding of the changes in the 
financial position and performance of the Group since the last annual 
consolidated financial statements as at and for the year ended December 31, 
2015.</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.65pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(b) Basis of measurement</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.65pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The 
unaudited condensed consolidated interim financial statements have been prepared
on the historical cost basis except for:</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">&#160;</div>

FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(c) Functional and presentation currency<br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.5pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">These
condensed consolidated interim financial statements are presented in United 
States dollars, which is also the functional currency of the Company. All 
financial information presented in United States dollars have been rounded to 
the nearest thousand, unless indicated otherwise.</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.5pt"><font
style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">3</font><font style="WIDTH: 31.5pt; DISPLAY: inline-
block; FONT-SIZE: 1px" id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;</font><font style="FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Use of estimates and judgements</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.5pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Management makes 
estimates and assumptions about the future that affect the reported amounts of 
assets and liabilities. Estimates and assumptions are continually evaluated 
based on historical experience and other factors, including expectations of 
future events that are believed to be reasonable under the circumstances. Actual
experience may differ from these estimates and assumptions. In preparing t<font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">hese condensed consolidated interim financial statements, the significant 
judgements made by management in applying the Group's accounting policies and 
the key sources of estimation uncertainty were the same as those that applied as
at December 31, 2015 and should be read in conjunction with the Group's annual 
consolidated financial statements for the year ended December 31, 2015<br>
</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 
4.3pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.3pt"><font
style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">4</font><font style="WIDTH: 31.7pt; DISPLAY: inline-
block; FONT-SIZE: 1px" id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;</font><font style="FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Significant accounting policies</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Except as stated 
otherwise, the same accounting policies and methods of computation have been 
applied consistently to all periods presented in these condensed consolidated 
interim financial statements as compared to the Group's annual financial 
statements for the year ended December 31, 2015. In addition, the accounting 
policies have been applied consistently by the Group entities.</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="0b4815eceb814c8286782204f5965c82" class="DSPFListTable"
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 4.5pt"></td>
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Share based payment expense</font></td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The fair value of the 
amount payable to employees in respect of share based awards, which will be 
settled in cash, is recognised as an expense with a corresponding increase in 
liabilities, over the period over which the employee becomes unconditionally 
entitled to payment. The liability is re-measured at each reporting date. Any 
changes in the fair value of the liability are recognised as an expense in 
profit or loss.</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Additional information about significant 
judgements and estimates and the assumptions used to estimate fair value for 
cash settled share-based payment transactions are disclosed in note 8.</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font style="FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;
(ii) </font>Derivatives</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Derivatives are initially recognised at 
fair value on the date a derivative contract is entered into and are 
subsequently re-measured to their fair value at the end of each reporting 
period. The group does not designate derivatives as speculative hedging 
instruments, therefore subsequent changes in fair value are recognised in profit
or loss.</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="5e574d94927d44c6b5341a612bfa4b56" class="DSPFListTable" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 17pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: 
#000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; align: 
right">5</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT:
bold">Blanket Zimbabwe Indigenisation Transaction</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Blanket Mine (1983) (Private) Limited ("Blanket") indigenisation 
transaction</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">On February 20, 2012 the 
Group announced that it had signed a Memorandum of Understanding ("MoU") with 
the Minister of Youth, Development, Indigenisation and Empowerment of the 
Government of Zimbabwe pursuant to which the Group agreed that indigenous 
Zimbabweans would acquire an effective 51% ownership interest in the Blanket 
Mine for a paid transactional value of $30.09 million. Pursuant to the above, 
the Group entered into agreements with each Indigenisation Shareholder to sell 
its 51% ownership interest in Blanket Mine as follows:</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="1cb8934d607c42f1b22a9571a146293b" class="DSPFListTable" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 17pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-
ALIGN: top; align: right">&#183;</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">A 16% 
interest was sold to the National Indigenisation and Economic Empowerment Fund 
("NIEEF") for $11.74 million.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="5d390fd950f04a978c9bb31871f7eaed" class="DSPFListTable" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 17pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-
ALIGN: top; align: right">&#183;</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">A 15% 
interest was sold to Fremiro, which is owned by Indigenous Zimbabweans, for 
$11.01 million.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="68b5f2ee361f4161bbfae840b2fa5568" class="DSPFListTable" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 17pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-
ALIGN: top; align: right">&#183;</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">A 10%
interest was sold to Blanket Employee Trust Services (Private) Limited ("BETS") 
for the benefit of present and future managers and employees for $7.34 million. 
The shares in BETS are held by the Blanket Mine Employee Trust ("Employee 
Trust") with Blanket Mine's employees holding participation units in the 
Employee Trust.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="43f7ab4ae7c94075ace579420c9d6cd1" class="DSPFListTable" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 17pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-
ALIGN: top; align: right">&#183;</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">A 10% 
interest was donated to the Gwanda Community Share Ownership Trust ("Community 
Trust"). Blanket Mine undertook and paid a non-refundable donation of $1 million
to the Community Trust.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt"><br style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The Group facilitated the
vendor funding of these transactions which are repaid by way of dividends from 
Blanket Mine. 80% of dividends declared by Blanket Mine are used to repay such 
loans and the remaining 20% unconditionally accrues to the respective Indigenous
Shareholders. Outstanding balances on these facilitation loans attract interest 
at a rate of 10% over the 12-month LIBOR. The timing of the repayment of the 
loans depends on the future financial performance of Blanket Mine and the extent
of future dividends declared by Blanket Mine. </font>To facilitate the capital 
expenditure of a production expansion programme Blanket Mine has suspended 
dividend payments. A moratorium was placed on interest until dividend payments 
resumed in early August 2016.</div>
<div id="DSPFPageFooter"></div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always" id="DSPFPageBreak">
<hr style="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; 
WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; 
COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" noshade="noshade">
</div>
</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">
<div id="DSPFPageHeader"></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.5pt; FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Caledonia Mining 
Corporation Plc</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.3pt; FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Notes to the Condensed 
Consolidated Interim Financial Statements</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.25pt; FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">For the six months 
ended June 30, 2016 and June 30, 2015</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.25pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(<font style="FONT-
STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In
thousands of United States dollars, unless indicated otherwise</font>)</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.25pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">
<hr style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 
0.8pt; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: auto; MARGIN-RIGHT: auto" align="center">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageFooter"></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">5</font><font style="WIDTH: 36pt; DISPLAY: inline-block; FONT-SIZE: 1px" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Blanket 
Zimbabwe Indigenisation Transaction (continued)</font></div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt"><br style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The facilitation loans 
were declared by Caledonia Holdings Zimbabwe (Blanket Mine's parent company) to 
a wholly-owned subsidiary of Caledonia Mining Corporation Plc as a dividend in 
specie on February 14, 2013 and withholding tax amounting to $1.504 million was 
paid and expensed on March 5, 2013.</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt"><br style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Recapitalisation of 
Blanket Mine</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">During quarter 4 of 2015 the decision was
taken to recapitalise Blanket Mine's cash resources and Caledonia approved an 
intercompany loan of $5.0m to Blanket Mine through <font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Caledonia 
Holdings Zimbabwe (Private) Limited ("CHZ") a wholly owned subsidiary of the 
Company</font>.&#160; It was intended that these loans would be re-structured as
a rights issue by Blanket Mine so that all of Blanket Mine's shareholders would 
participate in the recapitalisation. The indigenous Zimbabwean shareholders 
would receive additional vendor funding to participate in the rights issue. The 
re-structuring of the intercompany loans was expected to be finalised during 
Quarter 2 of 2016, once certain administrative conditions were fulfilled.&#160; 
The strengthening in the gold price during 2016 and the sale of the Blanket Mine
treasury bills (refer to note 9) meant that Blanket Mine's cash position was 
better than expected and it had no need for an injection of permanent 
funding.&#160; Therefore the planned re-structure of the vendor finance loans 
were cancelled and the intercompany loans totalling $5.0m were repaid to CHZ on 
July 1, 2016.</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The indigenisation 
agreements concluded on February 20, 2012, were accounted for as follows:</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="c769a69ce65e43a5b4d496b83ab6d357" class="DSPFListTable" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 17pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-
ALIGN: top; align: right">&#183;</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">Non-
controlling interests (NCI) were recognised on the portion of shareholding upon 
which dividends declared by Blanket Mine will accrue unconditionally to equity 
holders as follows:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="e796bdc36b564dc5882facca23f75851" class="DSPFListTable" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt"></td>
<td style="WIDTH: 54pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: 
#000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">20% of the 
16%&#160; shareholding of NIEEF;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="6a54131c28a64afaaa037dd6dbe01ff1" class="DSPFListTable" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt"></td>
<td style="WIDTH: 54pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: auto; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">20% of the 15%&#160; shareholding 
of Fremiro;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="cbbd61cb2d804d1e8c26c29a54decb75" class="DSPFListTable" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt"></td>
<td style="WIDTH: 54pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: 
#000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">100% of the 
10% shareholding of the Community Trust.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="3f527b543c3449a6945bc905502f2064" class="DSPFListTable" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 17pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-
ALIGN: top; align: right">&#183;</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">This 
effectively means that NCI is recognised at Blanket Mine level at 16.2% of the 
net assets.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="348348a2b7244ab4af39bd368a4da532" class="DSPFListTable" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 17pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-
ALIGN: top; align: right">&#183;</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<div>The remaining 80% of the shareholding of NIEEF and Fremiro is recognised as
non-controlling interests to the extent that their attributable share of the net
asset value of Blanket Mine exceeds the balance on&#160; the facilitation loans 
including interest. At June 30, 2016 the attributable net asset value did not 
exceed the balance on the respective loan accounts and thus no additional NCI 
was recognised.</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="43c864f7220447b79213baccfbbdb51a" class="DSPFListTable" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 17pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-
ALIGN: top; align: right">&#183;</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The 
transaction with the BETS will be accounted for in accordance with IAS 19 
</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, 
serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Employee Benefits</font><font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"> (profit sharing arrangement) as the ownership of the shares does not 
ultimately pass to the employees. The employees are entitled to participate in 
20% of the dividends accruing to the 10% shareholding in Blanket Mine if they 
are employed at the date of such distribution. To the extent that 80% of the 
attributable dividends exceed the balance on the BETS facilitation loan they 
will accrue to the employees at the date of such declaration.</font></td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="c11a428ebbe84c5098305e174c982292" class="DSPFListTable" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 17pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-
ALIGN: top; align: right">&#183;</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">The Employee
Trust and BETS are structured entities which are effectively controlled and 
consolidated by Blanket Mine. Accordingly the shares held by BETS are 
effectively treated as treasury shares in Blanket Mine and no NCI is 
recognised.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 4.25pt; font-family: 'Times New

the six months ended June 30, 2016 and June 30, 2015</div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 4.25pt; font-family: 'Times New

balances</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">&#160;</div>
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-

</td>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">NCI </div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Recognised</div>
</td>

interest moratorium has been placed on all facilitation loans until dividends 
are resumed by Blanket Mine.</div>

are effectively treated as treasury shares (see above).</div>

Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">~ Accounted for under 
IAS19 <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Employee Benefits.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"># Facilitation loans are 
accounted for as equity instruments and are accordingly not recognised as loans 
receivable (see above).</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt"><br style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Advance dividends</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In anticipation of 
completion of the subscription agreements, Blanket Mine agreed to an advance 
dividend arrangement with the Community Trust against their right to receive 
dividends declared by Blanket Mine on their shareholding. Advance dividends were
paid as follows:</div>

advance payments have been recorded to a loan account bearing interest at a rate
of 10% over the 12-month LIBOR.&#160; The loan is repayable by way of set off of
future dividends on the Blanket Mine shares owed by the Community Trust. The 
outstanding balance of the advance dividend loan is $3,237,000 (2015: 
$3,237,000). A moratorium was placed on the interest of the advanced dividend 
loan until such time as dividends resume, no repayments have been made or 
interest accumulated from December 31, 2014. Dividends and interest 
</font>resumed in early August 2016<font style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman',

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY:
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">8</font><font style="WIDTH: 50pt; DISPLAY: inline-block; FONT-SIZE: 1px" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Share based 
payment expense<br>
</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Certain key management members were 
granted Restricted Share Units ("RSU's") and Performance Share Units ("PSU's"), 
pursuant to provisions of the 2015 Omnibus Equity Incentive Compensation 
Plan.<br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">303,225 RSU's and 1,212,903 PSU's were 
granted and approved by the Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors on 
January 11, 2016. These RSU's will vest on January 11, 2019 given that the 
service condition of the relevant employees are fulfilled at this date. The 
value of the vested RSU's will be the amount of RSU's vested multiplied by the 
fair market value, as specified by the plan, on date of settlement.<br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Of the 1,212,903 PSU's, 109,677 PSU's 
have a performance period from January 1, 2016 to December 31, 2016 and 
1,103,226 from January 1, 2016 to December 31, 2018. Both have a vesting date of
January 11, 2019.<br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always" id="DSPFPageBreak">
<hr style="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; 
WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; 
COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" noshade="noshade">
</div>
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageFooter">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">
<div id="DSPFPageHeader"></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.5pt; FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Caledonia Mining 
Corporation Plc</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.3pt; FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Notes to the Condensed 
Consolidated Interim Financial Statements</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.25pt; FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">For the six months 
ended June 30, 2016 and June 30, 2015</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.25pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(<font style="FONT-
STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In
thousands of United States dollars, unless indicated otherwise</font>)</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.25pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">
<hr style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 
0.8pt; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: auto; MARGIN-RIGHT: auto" align="center">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageFooter"></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt"></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">PSU's have a service condition and a 
performance condition attached. The performance condition is a function of 
production cost, gold production and central shaft depth targets on certain 
specified dates.&#160; The number of shares that will vest will be the PSU units
multiplied by the Performance Multiplier, which will reflect the actual 
performance in terms of the performance conditions compared to expectations on 
the date of the award. RSU holders are entitled to receive dividends over the 
vesting period. Such dividends will be reinvested in additional RSU's at the 
then applicable share price calculated at the average Royal Bank of Canada noon 
rate immediately preceding the dividend payment, at reporting date <font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">9,624</font> additional RSU's have been granted due to dividend 
reinvestments. PSU's have rights to dividends only after they have vested.</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">On March 23, 2016, an additional 54,839 
RSU's and 219,355 PSU's were granted to Mr. M Learmonth which will vest on March
23, 2019.&#160; The RSU's have only a service condition attached, whereas the 
PSU's have a performance period of January 1, 2016 to December 31, 2018 with the
same performance criteria as the January 11, 2016 grants.</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The fair value of the RSU's were 
estimated to be the Toronto Stock Exchange ("TSX") share price on reporting 
date. The fair value of the PSU's were calculated as the TSX share price at 
reporting date less the fair value of the expected dividends during the vesting 
period multiplied by the performance multiplier expectation.&#160; At this 
reporting date it is expected that the performance multiplier will be 100% of 
expectations.</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The following assumptions were used in 
estimating the fair value of the cash settled share based payment liability on 
June 30, 2016:</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">&#160;</div>
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.3pt"><font
style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">9</font><font style="WIDTH: 45.7pt; DISPLAY: inline-
block; FONT-SIZE: 1px" id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;</font><font style="FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Sale of Blanket Mine treasury bills<br>
</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">On May 12, 2016 
Blanket Mine had sold treasury bills ("Bills") issued by the Government of 
Zimbabwe for<font style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: 
#000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"> a total consideration of $3,203,000</font>.&#160; The
Bills were issued to Blanket in 2015 and replaced the Special Tradeable Gold 
Bonds ("Bonds") which were issued to Blanket in 2009 as part consideration for 
gold sales that were made by Blanket in 2008 under the terms of the sales 
mechanism that existed at that time for Zimbabwean gold producers. The Bonds 
were fully impaired in previous years, and the impairment value was applied as a
deduction from Blanket's income tax liability.&#160; The gross sales proceeds 
were subject to Zimbabwean income tax at 25.75% in the current quarter.<br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.3pt"><font
style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">10</font><font style="WIDTH: 45.7pt; DISPLAY: inline-
block; FONT-SIZE: 1px" id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;</font><font style="FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Margin call on gold hedge</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 
4.3pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always" id="DSPFPageBreak">
<hr style="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; 
WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; 
COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" noshade="noshade">
</div>
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageFooter">
<div style="text-align: justify; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
margin-left: 4.3pt; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 14.4pt;">
<div id="DSPFPageHeader"></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.5pt; FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Caledonia Mining 
Corporation Plc</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.3pt; FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Notes to the Condensed 
Consolidated Interim Financial Statements</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.25pt; FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">For the six months 
ended June 30, 2016 and June 30, 2015</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.25pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(<font style="FONT-
STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In
thousands of United States dollars, unless indicated otherwise</font>)</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.25pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">
<hr style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 
0.8pt; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: auto; MARGIN-RIGHT: auto" align="center">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageFooter"></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In February 2016, the
Company entered into a hedge in respect of 15,000 ounces of gold over a period 
of 6 months.&#160; The hedge protects the Company if the gold price falls below 
$1,050 per ounce but gives Caledonia full participation if the price of gold 
exceeds $1,079 per ounce. The derivative financial instrument was entered into 
by the Company for economic hedging purposes and not as a speculative 
investment.</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.5pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The derivative 
financial liability is measured at fair value and resulted in a loss of $435,000
included in profit or loss. Of the $435,000 loss recognised, $381,000 has 
realised as at June 30, 2016. The Company has the intention to net settle the 
loss with the $435,000 margin call deposited, which constitutes the Company's 
maximum potential exposure in terms of the hedge.</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.3pt"><font
style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">11</font><font style="WIDTH: 45.7pt; DISPLAY: inline-
block; FONT-SIZE: 1px" id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;</font><font style="FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Trade and other receivables</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">
<div id="DSPFPageHeader" style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 4.5pt; font-family: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; color: #000000; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: 
bold;">Caledonia Mining Corporation Plc</div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 4.3pt; font-family: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; color: #000000; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold;">Notes
to the Condensed Consolidated Interim Financial Statements</div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 4.25pt; font-family: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; color: #000000; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold;">For 
the six months ended June 30, 2016 and June 30, 2015</div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 4.25pt; font-family: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; color: #000000; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: 
bold;">(<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In thousands of United States dollars, unless indicated 
otherwise</font>)</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 4.25pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">
<hr style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 
0.8pt; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: auto; MARGIN-RIGHT: auto" align="center">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageFooter" style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">14</font><font style="WIDTH: 50pt; DISPLAY: inline-block; FONT-SIZE: 1px" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Operating 
Segments</font></div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt"><br style="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4pt">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The Group's operating 
segments have been identified based on geographic areas. The Group has three 
reportable segments as described below, which are the Group's strategic business
units. The strategic business units are managed separately because they require 
different decision making strategies. For each of the strategic business units, 
the Group's CEO reviews internal management reports on at least a quarterly 
basis. Geographical areas describing the operations of the Group's reportable 
segments are categorised as Corporate, Zimbabwe and South Africa. The Corporate 
segment comprises the holding company and Greenstone Management Services Limited
(United Kingdom). The Zimbabwe operating segment comprises Caledonia Holdings 
Zimbabwe Limited and subsidiaries. The Zambia segments consisted of Nama copper 
project and cobalt project during 2015. The Zambian entities which comprised a 
fourth strategic business unit in previous reporting periods were closed down on
September 2, 2015. The South Africa geographical segment comprises a gold mine 
as well as sales made by Caledonia Mining South Africa Proprietary Limited to 
the Blanket Mine. Information regarding the results of each reportable segment
is included below. Performance is measured based on segment profit before income
tax, as included in the internal management reports that are reviewed by the 
Group's CEO. Segment profit is used to measure performance as management 
believes that such information is the most relevant in evaluating the results of
certain segments relative to other entities that operate within these 
industries.</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt"><br style="LINE-HEIGHT: 15.75pt">
</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><a id="Exhibit99.2" 
name="Exhibit99.2"><!--Anchor--></a>Exhibit 99.2</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
<div>
<div id="DSPFPageHeader">
<div style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 7pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 7pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">CALEDONIA MINING CORPORATION 
PLC </div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 7pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">AUGUST 11,
2016</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
124.15pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
124.15pt">Management&#8217;s Discussion and Analysis</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.5pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">This 
management&#8217;s discussion and analysis (&#8220;MD&amp;A&#8221;) of the 
consolidated operating results and financial position of Caledonia Mining 
Corporation Plc (&#8220;Caledonia&#8221; or the &#8220;Company&#8221;) is for 
the quarter ended June 30, 2016 (&#8220;Q2 2016&#8221; or the 
&#8220;Quarter&#8221;), the six months ended June 30, 2016 (the &#8220;Half 
Year&#8221;) and the period ended August 11, 2016.&#160; It should be read in 
conjunction with the Unaudited Condensed Consolidated Interim Financial 
Statements of Caledonia for the quarter ended June 30, 2016 (&#8220;the 
Unaudited Condensed Consolidated Interim Financial Statements&#8221;) which are 
available from the System for Electronic Data Analysis and Retrieval at <font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>www.sedar.com</u></font> or from Caledonia&#8217;s website at <font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>www.caledoniamining.com</u></font>.&#160; The Unaudited Condensed 
Consolidated Interim Financial&#160; Statements and related notes have been 
prepared in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards 
(&#8220;IFRS&#8221;) as issued by the International Accounting Standards 
Board.&#160; In this MD&amp;A, the terms &#8220;Caledonia&#8221;, the 
&#8220;Company&#8221;, &#8220;we&#8221;, &#8220;our&#8221; and &#8220;us&#8221; 
refer to the consolidated operations of Caledonia Mining Corporation and our 
subsidiaries unless otherwise specifically noted or the context requires 
otherwise.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Note that all currency
references in this document are to US Dollars, unless otherwise stated.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center" id="DSPFPageNumberArea"><font style="FONT-STYLE:
normal; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: normal" id="DSPFPageNumber">1</font></div>
<div style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always" id="DSPFPageBreak">
<hr style="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; 
WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; 
COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" noshade="noshade">
</div>

<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center" id="DSPFPageNumberArea"><font style="FONT-STYLE:
normal; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: normal" id="DSPFPageNumber">2</font></div>
<div style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always" id="DSPFPageBreak">
<hr style="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; 
WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; 
COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" noshade="noshade">
</div>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 2pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 2pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 6pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6pt">
<table style="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt" id="z39d9ae17ba1c4e3cb65cedd74aa724ea" class="DSPFListTable" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 28.35pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; align: right">1.</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">OVERVIEW</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Caledonia is an 
exploration, development and mining corporation focused on Southern 
Africa.&#160; Following the implementation of indigenisation at the Blanket Mine
(&#8220;Blanket&#8221; or the &#8220;Blanket Mine&#8221;) in September 2012, 
Caledonia&#8217;s primary asset is a 49% legal ownership in Blanket, an 
operating gold mine in Zimbabwe.&#160; Caledonia continues to consolidate 
Blanket, as explained in Note 5 to the Unaudited Condensed Consolidated Interim 
Financial Statements, accordingly operational and financial information set out 
in this MD&amp;A is on a 100% basis, unless otherwise specified.&#160; 
Caledonia&#8217;s shares are listed in Canada on the Toronto Stock Exchange 
(symbol - &#8220;CAL&#8221;), on London&#8217;s AIM (symbol - 
&#8220;CMCL&#8221;) and are also traded on the American OTCQX (symbol - 
&#8220;CALVF&#8221;).</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt"><br>
</div>

<td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: #000000 2px solid; 
BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff; WIDTH: 9.75%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: middle; BORDER-TOP:

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.55pt">10,581</div>
</td>
<td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: #000000 2px solid;

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.55pt">Net cash increased in the quarter, but is
lower than June 30 2015 due to high levels of capital investment</div>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: #000000 2px solid;

</td>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

</td>
</tr>
</table>
<div style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; 
MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.55pt">Dividend Policy</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
4.3pt">On November 25, 2013 Caledonia announced a dividend policy in terms of 
which it paid a dividend of 6 Canadian cents per share in 2014, split into 4 
equal quarterly payments of 1.5 Canadian cents per share.&#160; The first 
quarterly dividend was paid on January 31, 2014 and subsequent quarterly 
dividends were paid thereafter.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
4.3pt">Following the announcement on December 16, 2015 that henceforth Caledonia
will report its financial results in United States Dollars, the quarterly 
dividends that were paid at the end of January and April 2016 were declared and 
denominated in United States Dollars as 1.125 United States cents.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
4.3pt">On July 5, 2016 Caledonia announced a quarterly dividend of 1.375 United 
States cents per share, or 5.5 United States cents per annum.&#160; The 
increased dividend represents Caledonia&#8217;s revised dividend policy.&#160; 
It is currently envisaged that the dividend of 5.5 United States cents per annum
will be maintained.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
4.3pt">________________________</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
4.3pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.3pt">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><sup style="vertical-align: text-top; 
line-height: 1; font-size: smaller">1</sup> Non-IFRS measures such as &#8220;On-
Mine Cost per ounce&#8221;, &#8220;AISC&#8221; and &#8220;average realised gold 
price&#8221; are used throughout this document. Refer to Section 10 of this 
MD&amp;A for a discussion of non-IFRS measures.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><sup style="vertical-align: text-top; 
line-height: 1; font-size: smaller">2</sup> Gross profit is after deducting 
royalties, production costs and depreciation but before administrative 
expenses.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><sup style="vertical-align: text-top; 
line-height: 1; font-size: smaller">3</sup> Adjusted EPS is a non-IFRS measure 
which aims to reflect Caledonia&#8217;s ordinary trading performance. Refer to 
Section 10 of this MD&amp;A for a discussion of non-IFRS measures.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><sup style="vertical-align: text-top; line-height: 1; font-
size: smaller">4</sup> Adjusted earnings per share is a non-IFRS measure which 
aims to reflect Caledonia&#8217;s ordinary trading performance. Refer to Section
10 of this MD&amp;A for a discussion of non-IFRS measures</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</div>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center" id="DSPFPageNumberArea"><font style="FONT-STYLE:
normal; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: normal" id="DSPFPageNumber">3</font></div>
<div style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always" id="DSPFPageBreak">
<hr style="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; 
WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; 
COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" noshade="noshade">
</div>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 4.55pt">Hedging</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In February 2016, the
Company entered into a derivative contract in respect of 15,000 ounces of gold 
over a period of 6 months and accordingly, the contract expired in July 
2016.&#160; The contract protected the Company if the gold price fell below 
$1,050 per ounce but gave Caledonia full participation if the price of gold 
exceeded $1,079 per ounce. The derivative contract was entered into by the 
Company for economic hedging purposes and not as a speculative investment.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
4.3pt">The derivative financial liability was measured at fair value and 
resulted in an expense of $435,000 (being the maximum economic exposure arising 
from the contract) which was included in profit or loss for Q1 2016. Of the 
$435,000 expense recognised in Q1 2016, $145,000 was realised as at March 31, 
2016 and $236,000 was realised in Q2 2016. The Company settled the expense with 
the $435,000 margin call deposited with the hedge counter-party.&#160;&#160; 
Blanket continues to sell all of its gold production to Fidelity Printers and 
Refiners Ltd (&#8220;Fidelity&#8221;), as required by Zimbabwean legislation, 
and receives the spot price of gold less an early settlement discount of 
1.25%.</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 4.3pt">Re-domicile from Canada to Jersey, Channel Islands</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">On February 18, 2016 
a Special Meeting of Caledonia&#8217;s shareholders voted to approve the 
continuance (the &#8220;Continuance&#8221;) of the Company from Canada to 
Jersey, Channel Islands.&#160; Caledonia&#8217;s Board of Directors subsequently
resolved to proceed with the proposed Continuance which became effective on 
March 19, 2016, whereupon the Company also adopted new charter documents and 
changed its name to Caledonia Mining Corporation Plc.&#160; Following the 
Continuance, Caledonia is domiciled in Jersey, Channel Islands for legal and tax
purposes; Caledonia&#8217;s shares (or depository interests) continue to be 
listed and traded on the Toronto Stock Exchange and on AIM and they continue to 
be traded on the OTCQX in the USA.</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 4.55pt">Strategy and Outlook</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Caledonia&#8217;s 
strategic focus continues to be the implementation of the Revised Investment 
Plan at Blanket, which was announced in November 2014 and is expected to extend 
the life of mine by providing access to deeper levels for production and further
exploration.&#160; Implementation of the Revised Investment Plan remains on 
target in terms of timing and cost.&#160; Caledonia&#8217;s board and management
believe the successful implementation of the Revised Investment Plan is in the 
best interests of all stakeholders because it is expected to result in increased
production, reduced operating costs and greater flexibility to undertake further
exploration and development, thereby safeguarding and enhancing Blanket&#8217;s 
long term future.&#160; Caledonia&#8217;s cash position is expected to improve 
as a result of the implementation of the Revised Investment Plan; Caledonia will
continue to assess new opportunities to invest surplus cash.</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Exploration</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">There has been an 
increased focus on exploration and resource development at Blanket Mine for 
several quarters which is now beginning to bear fruit.&#160; As reported in the 
previous quarter, new drilling machines have been acquired and commissioned as a
result of which the meters of diamond drilling has approximately doubled to 
6,100 per quarter.&#160; On July 27, 2016 Caledonia announced that 343,000 
tonnes of ore at a grade of 5.19g/t had been upgraded from inferred resource to 
indicated resource and 1.2 million tonnes of new inferred resource at a grade of
5.00g/t had also been added to inventory.</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center" id="DSPFPageNumberArea"><font style="FONT-STYLE:
normal; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: normal" id="DSPFPageNumber">4</font></div>
<div style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always" id="DSPFPageBreak">
<hr style="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; 
WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; 
COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" noshade="noshade">
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Director and Management Appointments</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">On July 26, 2016 
Caledonia announced the appointment of John McGloin as an independent non-
executive director and Maurice Mason as Vice President Investor Relations and 
Corporate Development.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In addition to his 
recent and relevant experience as an executive in the mining industry, Mr 
McGloin&#8217;s appointment will support Caledonia&#8217;s increased focus on 
exploration and resource development and will enhance Caledonia&#8217;s access 
to institutional investors.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Mr Mason will take 
over the day-to-day responsibility for Investor Relations and Corporate 
Development from Mr Learmonth, who, since November 2014 had combined this role 
with that of Chief Financial Officer.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Sale of 
Treasury Bills</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-TOP: 3pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">On May 16, 2016 the 
Company announced that Blanket Mine had sold treasury bills 
(&#8220;Bills&#8221;) issued by the Government of Zimbabwe for a gross value of 
approximately $3.2 million.&#160; The Bills were issued to Blanket in 2015 and 
replaced the Special Tradeable Gold Bonds (&#8220;Bonds&#8221;) which were 
issued to Blanket in 2009 as part consideration for gold sales that were made by
Blanket in 2008 under the terms of the sales mechanism that existed at that time
for Zimbabwean gold producers.&#160;&#160; The Bonds were fully written down in 
a previous accounting period, and the impairment value was applied as a 
deduction from Blanket&#8217;s taxable income.&#160; The gross sales proceeds 
are treated as income in the Quarter and the income were subject to Zimbabwean 
income tax at 25.75%.&#160; The net proceeds are deducted for the purposes of 
calculating adjusted earnings per share<sup style="vertical-align: text-top; 
line-height: 1; font-size: smaller">4</sup><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center" id="DSPFPageNumberArea"><font style="FONT-STYLE:
normal; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: normal" id="DSPFPageNumber">5</font></div>
<div style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always" id="DSPFPageBreak">
<hr style="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px;

COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" noshade="noshade">
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</div>

</td>
<td style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #cceeff; WIDTH: 1%; VERTICAL-

<td style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #cceeff; WIDTH: 1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: bottom"
